title: 怎么用制作记分牌
author: qkyqingming
txt_content: 是不是要用命令方块啊？

replies.author: 埃克斯歪
replies.txt_content: 叫做“scoreboard”，是记分板……另外不一定用命令方块，在聊天框也是可以的

replies.author: EternityTQ
replies.txt_content:

replies.txt_content:
